sentences.cn: 所有的希望都快要破灭了。

sentences.en: Article 40 Water rights extinguish upon the expiration of the approved duration.
sentences.cn: 第40条(水权之消灭与展限登记)水权于核准年限届满时消灭.

sentences.en: Firefighters are continuing working hard to now fully extinguish the blaze.
sentences.cn: 消防队员正继续努力灭火.

sentences.en: Firemen were called to extinguish the blaze.
sentences.cn: 有人打电话叫消防队员来扑灭大火。

sentences.en: It took about 50 minutes to extinguish the fire.
sentences.cn: 大约花了50分钟才把火扑灭。

sentences.en: Please extinguish your cigarette as the plane is preparing to land.
sentences.cn: 请您停止抽烟,因为飞机马上就要着陆了.

sentences.en: Please extinguish your cigarette when the ` no smoking'signs lights up.
sentences.cn: 当"禁止吸烟 " 的指示灯亮时,请您熄灭香烟.

sentences.en: Please extinguish your cigarette when the'no smoking'sign lights up.
sentences.cn: 当 “ 禁止吸烟 ” 的指示灯亮时,请您熄灭香烟.

sentences.en: Recently most domestic forest fire extinguish tends to depend on airplanes.
sentences.cn: 最近我国多处森林火灾通过空中灭火取得有效救援.

sentences.en: System capacitive current testing can guide arc - extinguish coil correct switching.
sentences.cn: 通过测试系统电容电流,可以指导消弧线圈的正确投切.

sentences.en: The firefighter manned the hose to extinguish the blaze.
sentences.cn: 该名消防队员操纵消防软管扑灭大火.

sentences.en: The firefighter put his life in danger to extinguish the forest fire.
sentences.cn: 消防员冒着生命危险扑灭森林大火.

sentences.en: The success of single - phase auto - recloser depends on the extinguish of secondary arc.
sentences.cn: 单相 自动重 合闸 能否成功很大程度上取决于潜供电弧是否快速熄灭.

sentences.en: The surroundings helped extinguish any idealistic fervour that might have existed.
sentences.cn: 会议的气氛也彻底浇灭了任何可能存在过的理想主义热情.

sentences.en: To extinguish ( a fire, for example ) by cutting off air.
sentences.cn: 封火, 灭火通过隔绝空气来熄灭 ( 如火等 )

sentences.en: We have to extinguish the memory of the defeat.
sentences.cn: 我们必须抹去对那次失败的记忆.

sentences.en: Yesterday chief executive Peter Kenyon did his best to extinguish the inferno.
sentences.cn: 然而昨天首席执行官肯扬使尽全身解数来定纷止争.

trans.tran_en: to make a fire or light stop burning or shining

trans.tran_cn: 熄灭， 扑灭； 使消亡， 使破灭
trans.tran_en: to make a fire or light stop burning or shining
